body.raw:
{
    "name": "{{index_name}}",
    "fields": [
        {
            "name": "id",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "key": true,
            "searchable": true
        },
        {
            "name": "url",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": true
        },
        {
            "name": "file_name",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": false,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "content",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": false,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "size",
            "type": "Edm.Int64",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "last_modified",
            "type": "Edm.DateTimeOffset",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": true,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "people",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.String)",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "locations",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.String)",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "orgs",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.String)",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "urls",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.String)",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "emails",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.String)",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "dates",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.String)",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "sentimentScore",
            "type": "Edm.Double",
            "searchable": false,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "keyPhrases",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.String)",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "mergedContent",
            "type": "Edm.String",
            "searchable": true,
            "filterable": true,
            "sortable": false,
            "facetable": false
        },
        {
            "name": "img_tags",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.ComplexType)",
            "fields": [
                {
                    "name": "name",
                    "type": "Edm.String",
                    "searchable": true,
                    "filterable": false,
                    "facetable": false
                },
                {
                    "name": "confidence",
                    "type": "Edm.Double",
                    "searchable": false,
                    "filterable": false,
                    "facetable": false
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "img_description",
            "type": "Collection(Edm.ComplexType)",
            "fields": [
                {
                    "name": "tags",
                    "type": "Collection(Edm.String)",
                    "searchable": true,
                    "filterable": false,
                    "facetable": false
                },
                {
                    "name": "captions",
                    "type": "Collection(Edm.ComplexType)",
                    "fields": [
                        {
                            "name": "text",
                            "type": "Edm.String",
                            "searchable": true,
                            "filterable": false,
                            "facetable": false
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "confidence",
                            "type": "Edm.Double",
                            "searchable": false,
                            "filterable": false,
                            "facetable": false
                        }
                    ]
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
